meanings.definition: A record of a property or item for sale.
meanings.sent1: I found a listing for a house in the newspaper.
meanings.sent2: The online listing showed pictures of the car for sale.
meanings.sent3: The listing for the haunted house included ghosts as roommates.
meanings.sent4: Her listing of excuses was longer than her actual to-do list.
meanings.sent5: The listing of exotic animals at the zoo amazed the visitors.

meanings.definition: An item included in a list.
meanings.sent1: The grocery listing reminded her to buy milk.
meanings.sent2: His name was the last listing on the attendance list.
meanings.sent3: The listing of ingredients for the potion was missing a crucial item.
meanings.sent4: She was the top listing on the leaderboard for the game.
meanings.sent5: The listing of endangered species highlighted the need for conservation.

meanings.definition: The act of making a list.
meanings.sent1: Her listing of chores helped her stay organized.
meanings.sent2: The listing of tasks for the day kept him on track.
meanings.sent3: The listing of excuses for being late was getting creative.
meanings.sent4: The listing of goals motivated her to work harder.
meanings.sent5: The listing of rules was necessary to maintain order.
